About Bimon

Bimon Mulberry Tea is crafted from 100% organic mulberry leaves, grown in the pristine valleys of Thailand. Our tea is rich in antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals, offering a soothing taste and numerous health benefits. Experience the pure essence of nature in every sip.

  • 100% Organic

    No pesticides or chemicals.

  • Healthy

    Rich in antioxidants.

  • Aromatic

    Smooth and relaxing taste.
